<div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Project Name</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="bucket.projectName"></div>
    </div>
    <hr>    
    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Add User</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <div class="input-append">
          <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-xlarge" placeholder="E-mail" type="text" ng-model="bucket.newUser.email">    
          <button class="btn " ng-click="bucket.addNewUser()">Add</button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="radios">Select User Type</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <label class="radio inline" for="radios-0">
          <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-0" value="User" ng-model="bucket.newUser.userType">User</label>
        <label class="radio inline" for="radios-1">
          <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-1" value="Administrator" ng-model="bucket.newUser.userType">Administrator</label>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group" ng-show="bucket.users.length > 0">
      <label class="control-label" for="radios">&nbsp;</label>
      <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
        <thead>
          <tr>
            <th>Email</th>
            <th>User type</th>
          </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
          <tr ng-repeat="user in bucket.users">
            <td>{[user.email]}</td>
            <td>{[user.userType]}</td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>
      </table>

    </div>
    <hr>    
    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Choose Storage</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <div class="input-append">
          <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-mini" placeholder="140 GB" type="number" ng-model="bucket.storage">    
          <span class="add-on">GB</span>
        </div>

      </div>
    </div>
    <hr>    
    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="checkboxes">Data Locations</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <div class="btn-group">
          <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="bucket.locations[0]" btn-checkbox>Ghent, Belgium</button>
          <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="bucket.locations[1]" btn-checkbox>Bruges, Belgium</button>
          <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="bucket.locations[2]" btn-checkbox>Lenoir, NC, USA</button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
